notes.discussion: Fever was low grade, intermittent type, relieved on taking medications, and subsided within a day. Not associated with chills and rigors.

timeline.activity: Vomitings, stomach pain, loose stools, cough with expectoration
timeline.symptom: Vomitings, stomach pain, loose stools, cough with expectoration

notes.discussion: Vomitings were non-projectile, non-bilious, containing food particles initially and later watery. Stomach pain was diffuse, increased after vomiting episode. Loose stools were small in quantity, not associated with pain abdomen, bloody stools, or tenesmus. Cough with expectoration was small in quantity, light green color, not associated with diurnal variations, and more in the right lateral position.

notes.demographics: Patient is conscious, coherent, cooperative. No pallor, no icterus, no clubbing, cyanosis, no koilonychia, no lymphadenopathy, no edema.
notes.physical_exam: Abdominal tenderness present, guarding and rigidity present. Trachea central in position, BAE+, NVBS. S1S2 heard, no thrills, no murmurs. All superficial and deep reflexes are normal.

timeline.activity: IVF NS, RL @ 150ml/hr, TAB DOLO 650 mg/PO/OD, INJ PANTOP 40MG/IV/BD, INJ ZOFER 4MG/IV/SOS
timeline.symptom: Fever, vomitings, loose stools, cough with expectoration
timeline.treatment: IVF NS, RL @ 150ml/hr, TAB DOLO 650 mg/PO/OD, INJ PANTOP 40MG/IV/BD, INJ ZOFER 4MG/IV/SOS

notes.discussion: Plan of care: IVF NS, RL @ 150ml/hr, TAB DOLO 650 mg/PO/OD, INJ PANTOP 40MG/IV/BD, INJ ZOFER 4MG/IV/SOS, watch for bleeding manifestations, postural BP monitoring, syrup TUSQ DS 15ml/PO/TID
